content.body:
Hello from Tokyo, Japan 🇯🇵

This is a final reminder that the deadline for in-person attendance at the 104th Meeting of TC39 hosted by Sony Interactive Entertainment is in < 10 hours ⏲️ 

Please check out the issue below asap if you wish to register!

👇

https://github.com/tc39/Reflector/issues/537
I have just sent out a registration confirmation for the 27 of you who have already signed up ✉️ If you **have not** received an email but thought you had registered already, please let me know!
content.formatted_body: I have just sent out a registration confirmation for the 27 of you who have already signed up ✉️ If you have not received an email but thought you had registered already, please let me know!
